column2: Obtain and equip a [[col:yellow]]talisman[[/col]] here to improve your character.
Obtain and equip an [[col:yellow]]enchanted item[[/col]] here to improve your character.
Characters will be on foot unless given a [[col:yellow]]mount[[/col]], or required to be mounted by default.||Mounts can be obtained via spending skill points on the relevant skills.
Obtain and equip a [[col:yellow]]weapon[[/col]] here to improve your character.||All weapons will grant the character with [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_magical.png]][[/img]]magical attacks.
Obtain and equip [[col:yellow]]armour[[/col]] here to improve your character.
Obtain and equip an [[col:yellow]]arcane item[[/col]] here to improve your character.||Arcane items are only available to spellcasters.
